hero.description: Web developer passionate about creating modern, fast and accessible experiences using technologies like Next.js, React, TypeScript and more.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate web developer with experience in technologies like TypeScript, JavaScript or Java. I love building clean, efficient, and visually appealing interfaces.
about.paragraph2: I'm 22 years old and always eager to keep learning. I'm naturally curious and enthusiastic about technology.
about.paragraph3: I particularly enjoy backend, although I also explore frontend to understand the full ecosystem. I've also worked with languages like Java and Python, which sparked my interest in cross plataform development.
